checks

checks de.unkrig: Wrap DO statement

Verifies that DO statements are uniformly wrapped and indented.

    • Property Summary

      Properties 
      Property Name and Description
      wrapBeforeLCurly
      Whether to wrap DO statements before the opening curly brace.

    • Property Detail

      • wrapBeforeLCurly

        Whether to wrap DO statements before the opening curly brace. Example: 
        do
{
